original_title: 密約　外務省機密漏洩事件
overview: TV film about the "Nishiyama Incident", a scandal surrounding the 1972 return of Okinawa to Japan. Produced to commemorate the 20th anniversary of TV Asahi in 1978 and released theatrically by Office Henmi in 1988.
title: Secret Agreement: Ministry of Foreign Affairs Secret Leak Incident
